dict.string: Today is 31 days, which are four weeks and three days, of the Omer
Hoy es treinta y un días, que son cuatro semanas y tres días del Omer.
Aujourd'hui est trente et un jours, qui sont quatre semaines et trois jours du Omer
СЕГОДНЯ ТРИДЦАТЬ ОДИН ДЕНЬ - ЧТО СОСТАВЛЯЕТ ЧЕТЫРЕ НЕДЕЛИ И ТРИ ДНЯ - ОМЕРА.
הַיּוֹם אֶחָד וּשְׁלֹשִׁים יוֹם שֶׁהֵם אַרְבָּעָה שָׁבוּעוֹת וּשְׁלֹשָׁה יָמִים לָעֽוֹמֶר
Tiferes ShebeHod
Tiferet ShebeHod
Tiféret chebeHod
ТИФЕРЕС ШЕБЕ-ОД
תִּפְאֶֽרֶת שֶׁבְּהוֹד
Tiferet of Hod
Compassion in Humility

Examine if your humility is compassionate.
Just as humility brings compassion, compassion can lead one to humility. If you lack humility, try acting compassionately, which can help bring you to humility.
Shyness, Insecurity and Social Anxiety
A viewer asks: "I have some social issues. I have a hard time relating to other people. I feel like I have nothing to talk about with other people. I feel like an isolated loser."
https://youtu.be/Oxlc2zJ9gQ4
Express a humble feeling in an act of compassion.
Does my humility cause me to be self-contained and anti-social or does it express itself in empathy for others?
Is my humility balanced and beautiful?
Or is it awkward?
</br> Just as humility brings compassion, compassion can lead one to humility. If you lack humility, try acting compassionately, which can help bring you to humility
